One idea to overcome the boredom of repeating mundane tasks every day could be to challenge yourself to live without electricity for a day. This would force you to find alternative ways to accomplish tasks and could lead to a sense of accomplishment and excitement. For example, you could use candles or natural light to see, hand wash your clothes, and cook on a camp stove.

Another idea could be to try a new hobby or activity that requires no electricity, such as knitting, painting, or playing an instrument. This could give you a creative outlet and help break up the monotony of daily tasks.

You could also try to incorporate more physical activity into your day, such as going for a walk or jog, doing yoga or stretching exercises, or playing a sport. This could help boost your energy and improve your mood.

Another idea could be to try a new form of meditation or mindfulness practice, such as guided meditation or breathing exercises. This could help you stay present and focused, and could help break up the monotony of daily tasks.

Finally, you could try to connect with nature more by spending time outdoors, such as hiking, camping, or gardening. This could help you feel more grounded and connected to the world around you, and could provide a sense of peace and calm.
